plot outline: A westernized foreign return indian who has problem wit every concept of indian culture. He falls in love with a prostitute. He marries a village girl after his parents force him to do so. But in first night he will have problem. He goes to prostitute every now and then. He leaves wife and give everythng to prostitute then he becomes victim of a disease and everyone leaves him but only his wife and friend returns to try to cure him
title: Raktha Kanneeru
plot: A westernized foreign return indian who has problem wit every concept of indian culture. He falls in love with a prostitute. He marries a village girl after his parents force him to do so. But in first night he will have problem. He goes to prostitute every now and then. He leaves wife and give everythng to prostitute then he becomes victim of a disease and everyone leaves him but only his wife and friend returns to try to cure him::Shireesh Katti

Mohan(Upendra) returns to India from Western Countries after completing his education. He doesn't like Indian culture and Indians at all even his mom and eventually, he falls in love with Kantha(Ramya Krishna), a prostitute for her even after his marriage. Soon, he suffers with Leprosy and Kantha starts treating him as an untouchable and throws him away from home. Later, he reaches his abandoned wife's house and after some emotional scenes the film comes to a gory end.::vamsi-68790
